General.Name: Aurora Optoelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Aurora Optoelectronics Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, prepares, and sells sapphire crystal materials and equipment in China. It also offers special equipment for precision processing of hard and brittle materials; and 3D glass hot bending machine. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

1.Name: Ms. Ying  Liang
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
